Package ohos.agp.render

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.Canvas

  • public class Canvas
extends Object
    Provides various draw calls to draw 2D graphics.

    This class draws text, image, and basic graphics such as rectangle, circle, and line. It uses attributes in Paint, such as color, paint style, and line thickness. Coordinates in this class are in unit of pixels.

    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Canvas.ClipOp
      Enumerates the modes for clipping the canvas with a particular path.
      static class  Canvas.PorterDuffMode
      Enumerates color blend modes.
      static class  Canvas.VertexMode
      Enumerates graphic shapes formed by connecting vertices.

    • Method Detail

      • drawRect

        public void drawRect​(RectFloat rect,
                     Paint paint)
        Draws a rectangle on the canvas.

        The rectangle is drawn using the parameter RectFloat.

        Parameters:
        rect - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the rectangle.
        paint - Indicates paint attributes describing color, line thickness, and paint style.

      • drawRect

        public void drawRect​(RectFloat rectFloat,
                     Paint paint,
                     Color color)
        Draws a rectangle on this canvas with a specified paint and color.
        Parameters:
        rectFloat - Indicates the rectangle to draw.
        paint - Indicates the paint used to draw the rectangle, which defines paint attributes such as the color, line thickness, and paint style.
        color - Indicates the specified paint color.
        Since:
        5

      • drawRect

        public void drawRect​(float left,
                     float top,
                     float right,
                     float bottom,
                     Paint paint)

        Parameters:
        left - Indicates the left bound of the rectangle.
        top - Indicates the top bound of the rectangle.
        right - Indicates the right bound of the rectangle.
        bottom - Indicates the bottom bound of the rectangle.
        paint - Indicates the paint attributes including the color, line thickness, and paint style.

      • drawCircle

        public void drawCircle​(float x,
                       float y,
                       float radius,
                       Paint paint)
        Draws a circle on the canvas.

        The circle is drawn using specified center, radius, and Paint attributes.

        Parameters:
        x - Indicates the X-axis coordinate of the center.
        y - Indicates the Y-axis coordinate of the center.
        radius - Indicates the radius.
        paint - Indicates paint attributes describing color, line thickness, and paint style.

      • drawRoundRect

        public void drawRoundRect​(RectFloat rect,
                          float radiusX,
                          float radiusY,
                          Paint paint)
        Draws a rounded rectangle on the canvas.

        The rounded rectangle is drawn using the parameter RectFloat, and the X-axis and Y-axis radiuses of the ovals used to round the corners of the rectangle.

        Parameters:
        rect - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the enclosing rectangle of the rounded corner.
        radiusX - Indicates the X-axis radius of the ovals used to round the corners of the enclosing rectangle.
        radiusY - Indicates the Y-axis radius of the ovals used to round the corners of the enclosing rectangle.
        paint - Indicates paint attributes describing color, line thickness, and paint style.

      • drawOval

        public void drawOval​(RectFloat rect,
                     Paint paint)
        Draws an oval on the canvas.

        The oval is drawn according to the position and size of its enclosing rectangle.

        Parameters:
        rect - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the enclosing rectangle of the oval.
        paint - Indicates paint attributes describing color, line thickness, and paint style.

      • drawArc

        public void drawArc​(RectFloat rect,
                    Arc arc,
                    Paint paint)
        Draws an arc on the canvas.

        The arc is drawn using the RectFloat and Arc objects.

        Parameters:
        rect - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the enclosing rectangle of the arc.
        arc - Indicates the arc parameters such as the start angle, sweep angle, and whether to draw the lines from both end points of the arc to its center.
        paint - Indicates paint attributes describing color, line thickness, and paint style.

      • drawArc

        public void drawArc​(RectFloat rect,
                    Arc arc,
                    Paint paint,
                    Color color)
        Draws an arc on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        rect - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the enclosing rectangle of the arc.
        arc - Indicates the arc parameters such as the start angle, sweep angle, and whether to draw the lines from both end points of the arc to its center.
        paint - Indicates paint attributes describing color, line thickness, and paint style.
        color - Indicates the color.
        Since:
        5

      • drawPolylineShadow

        public void drawPolylineShadow​(float[] points,
                               Point startColorPoint,
                               Point endColorPoint,
                               Paint paint)
        Draws a gradient polyline.

        The gradient polyline is specified by the start and end points, start and end coordinates of the gradient color, and the Paint attributes.

        Parameters:
        points - Indicates the float array that represents the start and end points of the polyline. Each float array contains four elements. If you want to draw two gradient polylines, eight elements (four per array) are required.
        startColorPoint - Indicates the start coordinate of the gradient color.
        endColorPoint - Indicates the end coordinate of the gradient color.
        paint - Indicates paint attributes such as gradient color, line thickness, and paint style.
        Since:
        3

      • save

        public int save​()
        Saves the drawing state of the canvas.

        When this method is called, the drawing state is saved to a Canvas stack. When the restore() method is called, the canvas is restored to the latest drawing state saved.

        Returns:
        return the depth of saved stack.

      • restore

        public void restore​()
        Restores the canvas to its latest drawing state saved.

        This method is used with the save() interface.

      • restoreToCount

        public void restoreToCount​(int saveCount)
        Restores the canvas to the drawing state specified by saveCount.

        This method pops out all drawing states that have been saved to the stack. The value of saveCount must be greater than or equal to 1. Values less than 1 are treated as 1.

        Parameters:
        saveCount - Indicates the drawing state to which the canvas restores.

      • setMatrix

        public void setMatrix​(Matrix matrix)
        Replaces the matrix stored in a canvas with a new one.

        setMatrix is used to implement the translation, rotation, and scaling of a matrix.

        Parameters:
        matrix - Indicates the new matrix with which the current matrix is replaced.

      • resetMatrix

        public void resetMatrix​()
        Resets the matrix.
        Since:
        5

      • clipRect

        public void clipRect​(Rect rect)
        Cuts a specified rectangle from this canvas.
        Parameters:
        rect - Indicates the rectangle to cut.
        Since:
        5

      • clipRect

        public void clipRect​(RectFloat rect)
        Clips a specified rectangle out of a canvas.
        Parameters:
        rect - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the rectangle into which the canvas is clipped.

      • clipRect

        public void clipRect​(RectFloat rect,
                     Canvas.ClipOp op)
        Clips a specified rectangle in a specified mode.
        Parameters:
        rect - Indicates the rectangle to clip.
        op - Indicates the clipping mode, either ClipOp#INTERSECT or ClipOp#DIFFERENCE.
        Since:
        3

      • rotate

        public void rotate​(float degree)
        Rotates this canvas.
        Parameters:
        degree - Indicates the clockwise rotation angle.
        Since:
        5

      • rotate

        public void rotate​(float degree,
                   float x,
                   float y)
        Rotates the canvas by a given angle relative to the rotation center.
        Parameters:
        degree - Indicates the clockwise rotation angle of the canvas.
        x - Indicates the X-axis coordinate of the rotation center.
        y - Indicates the Y-axis coordinate of the rotation center.
        Since:
        3

      • scale

        public void scale​(float scaleX,
                  float scaleY,
                  float pointX,
                  float pointY)
        Scales a canvas with an anchor point.

        The canvas will scale according to the scaling multiples on X-axis and Y-axis of the anchor point.

        Parameters:
        scaleX - Indicates scaling multiple on X-axis used to scale the canvas.
        scaleY - Indicates scaling multiple on Y-axis used to scale the canvas.
        pointX - Indicates the X-axis coordinate of the scaling anchor point.
        pointY - Indicates the Y-axis coordinate of the scaling anchor point.
        Since:
        3

      • scale

        public void scale​(float scaleX,
                  float scaleY)
        Scales the canvas according to the anchor point. By default, the coordinate of the anchor point is (0,0).
        Parameters:
        scaleX - Indicates scaling multiple on X-axis used to scale the canvas.
        scaleY - Indicates scaling multiple on Y-axis used to scale the canvas.
        Since:
        3

      • translate

        public void translate​(float distanceX,
                      float distanceY)
        Translates a canvas by a specified distance.
        Parameters:
        distanceX - Indicates the distance on the X-axis by which the canvas will translate, in pixels.
        distanceY - Indicates the distance on the Y-axis by which the canvas will translate, in pixels.
        Since:
        3

      • drawText

        public void drawText​(Paint paint,
                     String text,
                     float x,
                     float y)
        Draws text at the specified coordinate origin.
        Parameters:
        paint - Indicates paint attributes describing color, line thickness, and font size.
        text - Indicates the text to draw, in string.
        x - Indicates the X-axis of the origin of the text to draw.
        y - Indicates the Y-axis of the baseline of the text to draw.
        Since:
        2

        xCoor - Indicates the x-coordinate of the text to draw.
        yCoor - Indicates the y-coordinate of the text to draw.

      • drawTextOnPath

        public void drawTextOnPath​(Paint paint,
                           String text,
                           Path path,
                           float advance,
                           float offset)
        Draws text on the specified path.
        Parameters:
        paint - Indicates paint attributes describing text color, size and so on.
        text - Indicates the text to draw.
        path - Indicates the path used to draw the text.
        advance - Indicates the distance between the start point of path and text.
        offset - Indicates the vertical distance between text's baseline and path.
        Since:
        3

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture​(Texture texture)
        Sets the canvas texture for off-screen rendering.
        Parameters:
        texture - Indicates the texture to set.
        Since:
        3

      • drawLines

        public void drawLines​(float[] points,
                      Paint paint)
        Draws multiple lines on a canvas.

        The start and end points of each line must be specified.

        Parameters:
        points - Indicates the floating point array. Each floating point array contains four values.
        paint - Indicates paint attributes describing color, line thickness, and font size.

      • drawLines

        public void drawLines​(float[] points,
                      int offset,
                      int drawCount,
                      Paint paint)
        Draws multiple specified line segments.
        Parameters:
        points - Indicates the array of start and end points for each line segment. Two adjacent points in the array can form a vertex coordinate.
        offset - Indicates the offset of the elements in the points array.
        drawCount - Indicates the number of consecutive elements in the points array, that is, the number of line segments to draw. The value of this parameter is a multiple of 4, and the sum of drawCount and offset is less than or equal to the number of elements in the points array.
        paint - Indicates the paint to use, which specifies the line segment attributes, such as the color, paint style, and line thickness.
        Since:
        3

      • drawDeformedPixelMap

        public void drawDeformedPixelMap​(PixelMapHolder holder,
                                 PixelMapDrawInfo drawInfo,
                                 Paint paint)
        Draws a pixel map that can be deformed.

        This method can be used to deform a pixel map to produce effects such as rippling and floating.

        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the holder of the pixel map to be deformed.
        drawInfo - Indicates the drawing information. You can set this parameter to deform the pixel map for producing different effects. For details about the parameter settings, see PixelMapDrawInfo.
        paint - Indicates the paint used to draw the pixel map. This parameter can be null.
        Since:
        3

      • drawPixelMapHolder

        public void drawPixelMapHolder​(PixelMapHolder holder,
                               float left,
                               float top,
                               Paint paint)
        Draws a specific PixelMapHolder object and specifies the distance from the object to the upper left corner of the parent component.
        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the PixelMapHolder object to draw.
        left - Indicates the distance from the PixelMapHolder object to the left edge of the parent component.
        top - Indicates the distance from the PixelMapHolder object to the top edge of the parent component.
        paint - Indicates paint attributes such as color and alpha value.

      • drawPixelMapHolderRect

        public void drawPixelMapHolderRect​(PixelMapHolder holder,
                                   RectFloat rect,
                                   Paint paint)
        Draws a PixelMapHolder object into a destination rectangle.

        If its size does not fit the destination rectangle, the PixelMapHolder object automatically scales to the same size as the destination rectangle.

        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the PixelMapHolder object to draw.
        rect - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the PixelMapHolder object.
        paint - Indicates paint attributes such as color and alpha value.

      • drawPixelMapHolderRect

        public void drawPixelMapHolderRect​(PixelMapHolder holder,
                                   RectFloat rectSrc,
                                   RectFloat rectDst,
                                   Paint paint)
        Draws a rectangular PixelMapHolder object into a destination rectangle.

        If its size does not fit the destination rectangle, the Canvas automatically scales to the same size as the destination rectangle.

        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the PixelMapHolder object.
        rectSrc - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the source rectangle that specifies the PixelMapHolder object.
        rectDst - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the destination rectangle.
        paint - Indicates paint attributes such as color and alpha value.

      • drawPixelMapHolderCircleShape

        public void drawPixelMapHolderCircleShape​(PixelMapHolder holder,
                                          RectFloat rectSrc,
                                          float pointX,
                                          float pointY,
                                          float radius)
        Draws a circular PixelMapHolder object.

        The object is clipped into the source rectangle, and its position and size are specified by pointX, pointY, and radius.

        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the PixelMapHolder object.
        rectSrc - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the source rectangle.
        pointX - Indicates the X-axis coordinate of the center of the circular PixelMapHolder object.
        pointY - Indicates the Y-axis coordinate of the center of the circular PixelMapHolder object.
        radius - Indicates the radius of the circular PixelMapHolder object, in pixels.
        Since:
        3

      • drawPixelMapHolderRoundRectShape

        public void drawPixelMapHolderRoundRectShape​(PixelMapHolder holder,
                                             RectFloat rectSrc,
                                             RectFloat rectDst,
                                             float radiusX,
                                             float radiusY)
        Draws a round-rectangular PixelMapHolder object.

        The object is clipped into the source rectangle, and its position and size are specified by rectDst, radiusX, and radiusY.

        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the PixelMapHolder object.
        rectSrc - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the source rectangle.
        rectDst - Indicates the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of the destination rectangle.
        radiusX - Indicates the X-axis radius of the ovals used to round the corners of the PixelMapHolder object, in pixels.
        radiusY - Indicates the Y-axis radius of the ovals used to round the corners of thePixelMapHolder object, in pixels.
        Since:
        3

      • drawPath

                     Paint paint)

        The path effect depends on the paint style.

        Parameters:
        path - Indicates the path to draw.
        paint - Indicates the specified paint, which describes attributes such as paint fill and path effect.
        Since:

      • drawTexture

        public void drawTexture​(float posX,
                        float posY,
                        Texture texture)

        Parameters:

        posY - Indicates the Y-axis coordinate of the texture to draw.
        texture - Indicates the pixelmap file storing the drawing result.
        Since:
        3

      • drawChangelessTexture

        public void drawChangelessTexture​(float posX,
                                  float posY,
                                  Texture texture)
        Draws a changeless texture.

        Different from Canvas#drawTexture, this method can be used to efficiently draw a changeless texture, for example, the background of a compass dial.

        Parameters:
        posX - Indicates the x-coordinate of the canvas texture.
        posY - Indicates the y-coordinate of the canvas texture.
        texture - Indicates the texture to draw.
        Since:
        3

                        RectFloat destRectangle)
        Draws a picture in a specified area.
        Parameters:
        picture - Indicates the picture that contains recorded drawing calls.
        destRectangle - Indicates the destination rectangle area to hold the picture. The picture is scaled to adapt to this area.
        Since:

      • quickReject

        public boolean quickReject​(float left,
                           float top,
                           float right,
                           float bottom)
        Quickly checks whether the canvas's visible area intersects with the clip area.
        Parameters:
        left - Indicates the coordinates of the left edge of the visible area.
        top - Indicates the coordinates of the top edge of the visible area.
        right - Indicates the coordinates of the right edge of the visible area.
        bottom - Indicates the coordinates of the bottom edge of the visible area.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the canvas's visible area does not intersect with the clip area; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • quickRejectRect

        public boolean quickRejectRect​(RectFloat rectFloat)
        Quickly checks whether specified rectangle does not intersect the clip region.
        Parameters:
        rectFloat - Indicates the specified rectangle.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the specified rectangle does not intersect the clip region; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • quickRejectPath

        public boolean quickRejectPath​(Path path)
        Quickly checks whether specified path does not intersect the clip region.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Returns true if the specified path does not intersect the clip region; returns false otherwise.

      • drawPoints

        public void drawPoints​(float[] pts,
                       int offset,
                       int count,
                       Paint paint)
        Draws a group of points.
        Parameters:
        pts - Indicates an array of coordinates for points (x1, y1), (x2, y2), and more.
        offset - Indicates the offset from where drawing starts in the array.
        count - Indicates the number of values in the array of coordinates. This value must be an even number, because each point has two coordinates.
        paint - Indicates the paint used to draw points.
        Since:
        4
